interface.name: Gtk-Sharp
interface.summary: Graphical User Interface Toolkit for mono and .Net
interface.description: Gtk# is a Graphical User Interface Toolkit for mono and .Net. The project binds the gtk+ (http://www.gtk.org/) toolkit and assorted GNOME (http://www.gnome.org/) libraries, enabling fully native graphical Gnome application development using the Mono and .Net development frameworks.
